A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: What an incoherent\, inconsistent\, stupid movie. I really don't understand what Rian Johnson is trying to do : destroying all coherence with the 8 previous movies (including Rogue one) ? Leia flying\, Rey and Ben jedi skyping\, Luke not even fighting... In addition to this massacre\, the jokes are mocking the design of the space ships (like the flatiron one\, come on)... A scenario that leads to no real evolution\, no charisma from any character. Very disappointing.
